page.title: 02WOMAN 5O+ LIVING ALONE
page.content: Lived in Portchester for thirty one years. Main problem in life is financial difficulties. Lives in a fairly large house with only one pension to live on. One national problem is too much crime due to lack of discipline. News of today is all crime and there are no good points. Wherever you live you could be subjected to muggings. To combat this corporal punishment should be brought back. Another problem is drugs, pregnant mothers are given too many drugs and drugs are given for the slightest illness. With many families having both parents at work their children are left on their own to get into bad habits ie smoking.The nuclear threat. We need a nuclear deterrent and we need to keep our armed forces up to date so they are strong and effective.
